title: Mr Boukadoum receives the resident representative of the World Bank in Algeria
text: Minister of Foreign Affairs, Mr Sabri Boukadoum, received on Wednesday, at the headquarters of the ministry, Mr Emanuel Cuvillier, who handed him the Cabinet letters, accrediting him as resident representative of the World Bank to the Algeria.

The two parties examined ways and means of strengthening the existing partnership between Algeria and the World Bank, in particular with regard to advisory and analysis services, at the request of the public authorities.
